title: Immigration medical exam results (I-693)
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, civil surgeon name/signature, vaccination records, exam date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake medical exams. Domain binding verifies USCIS-authorized civil surgeon. Green card requirement. Sealed envelope integrity. Vaccination compliance. Prevents medical exam fraud. For privacy, issuers can add a random salt line to raise entropy and defeat guessing attacks.
